tool_description: Extracts technical metadata from media files including EXIF data, dimensions, file properties, and other relevant information.

asset_id.description: Asset identifier to extract metadata from

include_exif.description: Whether to include EXIF data for images

error_messages: Asset not found: The specified asset_id does not exist.
File not accessible: The asset file cannot be read for metadata extraction.
Corrupted file: The file appears to be corrupted and metadata cannot be extracted.
usage: Provide the asset ID of any media file. Set include_exif to false if EXIF data is not needed for images.

dimensions.description: Width x Height for images/videos, or 'N/A' for other types

creation_date.description: File creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format

camera_info.description: Camera make and model if available, otherwise 'Unknown'
